item.title: Cleaning bad data
item.description: I am going to be cleaning up some text in a football file and create a scatterplot of it.The first step I need to do is include all the libraries I will be using. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.7 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.3 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 2.0.1 ✓ forcats 0.
